summary: The 'Accessing Satellite Capabilities to Enable New Discoveries Act' (ASCEND Act) mandates NASA to establish a program to acquire and disseminate commercial Earth remote sensing data and imagery. The program aims to support scientific, operational, and educational requirements of NASA, other federal agencies, and scientific researchers. The bill details data publication, transparency, and vendor acquisition protocols, emphasizing procurement from U.S. vendors. It also requires the Administrator to submit annual reports to relevant committees on data vendors, license terms, applications, and data usage agreements.
